|leader_title = |leader = Ugo Cappellacci |leader_party = PdL |ruling_party1 =
PdL |ruling_party2 = |NUTS = ITG |iso region = }} 'Sardinia' (, , ) is the
second largest island in the Mediterranean Sea (after Sicily and before Cyprus)
and an autonomous region of Italy. The nearest land masses are (clockwise from
north) the island of Corsica, the Italian Peninsula, Sicily, Tunisia, the
Balearic Islands and Provence.
categories: NUTS 2 statistical regions of the European Union
